sourcesContent:
import { Fragment, useEffect } from 'react'
import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'
import { Route, Switch, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom'

//Import Pages
import AllQuotes from './pages/AllQuotes'
import AddQuote from './pages/AddQuote'
import DetailQuote from './pages/DetailQuote'
import NotFound from './pages/NotFound'

//Import Components
import HeaderNav from './components/HeaderNav'

const DYMMY_DATA = [
  {id: 'q1', author: 'Hristo', content: 'Some Quote 1'},
  {id: 'q2', author: 'Koko', content: 'Some Quote 2'}
]

function App() {
  const allQuotes = useSelector(state => state.quote)

  useEffect(() => {
    fetch()
  }, [])

  console.log(allQuotes)
  return (
    <Fragment>
      <header>
        <HeaderNav />
      </header>
      <main>
        <Switch>
          <Route path='/' exact>
            <Redirect to='/allQuote' />
          </Route>
          <Route path='/allQuote'>
            <AllQuotes quoteData={allQuotes} />
          </Route>
          <Route path='/addNewQuote'>
            <AddQuote />
          </Route>
          <Route path='/detail/:quoteId'>
            <DetailQuote quoteData={allQuotes}/>
          </Route>
          <Route path='*'>
            <NotFound />
          </Route>
        </Switch>
      </main>
    </Fragment>
  );
}

export default App;
